name: places/ChIJUzBXjgn3wokRbvBnlUtogF4
formattedAddress: 130 E 107th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 130 E 107th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: 7 days in and 3 of my natural nails have broken and the paint peeled off. The set I got done from another salon before I came in lasted 2 weeks and was barely starting to chip. The service was lackluster but I don’t mind for stellar quality. I also asked her to keep my nails round like they were when I came in and she didn’t listen and made them square, filing them down WAY more than was necessary. Still, I gave a 33% tip because these looked pretty nice on day one and Monica took a lot of time doing them. I am upset that I spent $60 (set + tip) for a manicure that weakened my nails, broke them, and didn’t last. And when I messaged them about it on instagram, no reply. I’m going back to my last salon because they take much better care. And for the record, you’re supposed to soak gel nails off with nail polish remover; not shave them down with a power tool. I’m so upset.

originalText.text: Upon arrival I was seen quick . The woman that did my manicure failed to push any cuticles back as I ask along with painted my nails in a rush. The woman that did my pedicure not only cut my skin and I was actively bleeding she painted my toes and left paint on some skin. I asked her to clean it up and then she did but if I did not ask she was going to leave it as such. She then did not apologize for cutting me . The paint job was careless and rushed for both parts.10 hours after the manicure my nails chips . I did not wash any dishes just get ready for night out.

originalText.text: Horrible!!! I was soaking for an hour and the girl checked on me twice then had the audacity to blame my previous nail tech and say she stained my nails when there is still acrylic on them!! NO HEAT AND NO WATER AT THE NAIL SALON so beware of going if it’s cold cause you will literally disintegrate from the cold.

originalText.text:
Please don’t let the look of here bring you in like it did me. I went because I was going on vacation and it’s close to my home. I’ve been looking for a new nail salon and thought I found it based on the few reviews MAAAAN WAS I WRONG. I sat in the waiting chair for 10 min before someone asked if I needed help. I went for a full set n a pedicure with acrylic on my big toes (personal preference). The young man who did my services seems to just have been out of school or something. He stayed on his phone the entire time. Acrylic on my hands are in even they are chipping within a week my two big toe nails were so think I couldn’t wear any I closed shoes and they piped off in 4 days so I’m on vacation with messed up feet mind u my services totaled $95 !!!! This is on the high end and you would expect good/great work. During my pedicure service the foot bowl wasn’t full of water and it was cold and when I stated it he acted “surprised” and went and microwaved water to put in the pedicure bowl all in all this place looks nice but that’s it. NEVER AGAIN

I feel like the positive reviews are from the techs themselves or friends not actual customers because it always empty.

originalText.text:
I have found my personal oasis for nail care and pampering, a place that consistently leaves me feeling refreshed, confident, and utterly satisfied—my beloved bi-weekly nail salon. This establishment has truly mastered the art of providing exceptional service, delivering exquisite nail treatments that stand the test of time, and creating an atmosphere that exudes relaxation and luxury.

From the moment I step through the doors of this nail salon, I am greeted with warmth and professionalism. The staff is knowledgeable, courteous, and always ready to listen to my specific requests and preferences. They take the time to understand my needs and ensure that I am comfortable throughout the entire process. Their attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction are unparalleled.

The nail technicians at this salon are true artists. They possess an incredible level of skill, precision, and creativity. Regardless of whether I opt for a classic manicure or a trendy nail art design, their work never ceases to amaze me. The quality of the products they use is top-notch, resulting in nails that not only look stunning but also withstand the wear and tear of daily life. I'm always impressed by how long my nails and pedicure last—two and a half weeks of flawless beauty is no small feat!

Hygiene and cleanliness are of paramount importance at this salon. I appreciate their strict adherence to sanitary practices, ensuring that all tools and equipment are properly sterilized and disposable items are used when necessary. This attention to cleanliness gives me peace of mind and allows me to fully relax during my visits.

Another aspect that sets this nail salon apart is the wide range of services available. Whether I need a full set of acrylics, gel manicures, or a refreshing pedicure, they have it all. Additionally, they stay up to date with the latest nail trends and techniques, ensuring that I always have access to the most fashionable and cutting-edge options. The salon truly caters to all of my nail care desires.

Lastly, the prices at this salon are reasonable, considering the high-quality service and lasting results. The value I receive for my money is unmatched, and I gladly return every two weeks without hesitation. The salon's commitment to affordable luxury makes it accessible to a wide range of individuals seeking top-tier nail care.

In conclusion, my bi-weekly nail salon has become my haven for nail care and pampering. The combination of their expert nail technicians, long-lasting results, impeccable hygiene, luxurious ambiance, extensive services, and reasonable prices makes it an absolute gem. I wholeheartedly recommend this salon to anyone in search of an exceptional nail care experience. Prepare to be pampered, delighted, and leave with nails that radiate beauty for weeks on end.
